item.description:
圣诞新民俗：佛罗里达男子街上免费送毒品被捕 #别的简报# 【#佛罗里达男子免费送大妈被抓#，“这不是圣诞节嘛！”】
李岔·艾里斯·马刺儿（Richard Ellis Spurrier）是一位平凡的佛罗里达人，67 岁，本来他跟其他所有友善的佛州人一样无辜，但在 12 月 21 日上周六，他的乐善好施让自己陷入了困境。
据 WFLA 报道，警察在 “16 2nd St. N. in St. Pete” 街道处发现了他，当时他正拄着拐杖拿着一大包大妈给过往的路人免费派发，被逮捕时身上还有 45 克。警察问：“您这是图一什么呀？” 李岔回答道：“这不是过圣诞嘛！”
除了大妈之外，警方还在他的拐杖中发现了一把剑。
李岔已于当天中午 11 点被捕，罪名是拥有大妈并试图售卖 —— 在佛罗里达，娱乐用大妈还未合法。

Florida man is arrested for handing out marijuana on the street 'because it was Christmas'
https://i.dailymail.co.uk/1s/2019/12/24/16/22633486-0-image-m-60_1577205398859.jpg
A 67-year-old man was arrested after he was seen handing out marijuana to passers-by as 'Christmas presents'.
Richard Ellis Spurrier was stopped by officers in downtown St. Petersburg, Florida, as he had been dishing out narcotics to people in the street, police said.
According to his arrest affidavit, Spurrier was giving out cannabis 'because it was Christmas', he told officers.
Spurrier had 45 grams of marijuana on him and was handing it out to people as they passed by, police said.
Cops also noticed he had bits of cannabis hanging off his right shirt sleeve, police documents state.
Spurrier was charged with possession of marijuana with intent to sell, according to WFLA.
Officers said they found a hidden sword in Spurrier's cane when they arrested him along with a prescription bottle with his name on it.
A purple glass pipe and a black digital scale, both with marijuana residue on them were also found when police searched Spurrier.
Spurrier has since been released from the Pinellas County Jail.
